name: Space Blaster (MichaelKowal)
description:
Stop the Gobbs from taking over the universe! Space Blaster is an endless 2D shooter. Fight wave after wave of increasingly difficult enemies.  

This game was made for the MSU Game Design and Development course.  I made the following changes to the game:

- Added multiple UI elements
    - health bar
    - life bar
    - energy bar
    - progress bar
- Added splash screens to the start of each level
- Added pickup
    - Health
    - Life
    - Damage boost
    - Battery
- Added overheating weapon mechanic
- Added boss on every 5th level
- Every 5 levels enemies get faster, stronger, or do more damage

Created by Michael Kowal
